name: Goblin Tower Defense
description:
This game was to help me learn about making ai and other aspects of game development. I am still working on this game to hopefully make it actually worth playing. 

Currently in production is more maps and a better-looking map just to begin with.

I am currently wanting to add more :

  • Towers
  • Enemies
  • Levels
  • SFX

The only reason why I am publishing a game so unfinished is because of a different project that requires it. Because I do in fact feel really bad about putting something so unfinished up for public inspection.
